titleInfo.title: Map of East Baton Rouge Parish, 1895

mods.abstract: Cadastral map showing extent of East Baton Rouge Parish lands. Some landowners' and plantation names shown. Large inset on left side of map shows City of Baton Rouge proper. Bounded on west and northwest by Mississippi River. Extends north to East Feliciana Parish line; south to Ascension Parish line; and east to the Livingston Parish line. ‘Map of the Parish of East Baton Rouge Louisiana, compiled from the latest U. S. Survey’s records of the Parish and the land offices, and other reliable sources of information; according to resolution of Police Jury of Oct. 9th, 1893.' 'Large Roman figures indicate ward numbers, and small upright figures represent section numbers.' ‘Compiled and drawn by A. Kaiser & J. A. Swensson, Civil Engineers, 1895.’ Scale 1:43,000.
mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.

Access to unprocessed collections requires the permission of the curator, subject to Special Collections’ Policy on Access to Unprocessed Collections (http://www.lib.lsu.edu/special/about/unprocessed.html)
mods.note: William Waller Survey Collection, Mss. 3592, 3910, 4326, Louisiana and Lower Mississippi Valley Collections, LSU Libraries, Baton Rouge, La.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
